title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Preparing chicken tikka masala involves marinating chicken in yogurt and spices, searing it for a smoky flavor, and simmering it in a creamy, tomato-based sauce. It is best made with chicken thighs for maximum tenderness, with a recommended marination time of 3 hours to overnight.
